attributes.action: PREVENT THE TAKEOVER OF ASTRAZENECA BY PFIZER.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is in upper case lettering.


You have allowed the sale of everything that made these islands british.  Many of us believe (and will, one day, hold them to account for their treason) that our politicians are traitors by not acting, like German, like French politicians, who prevent the sale of their national assets, to protect the long term prosperity of the country.  IT IS TIME FOR POLITICIANS TO START THINKING ABOUT THE PEOPLE OF THIS LAND AND TO STOP ACTING ONLY IN THEIR OWN SELF INTEREST.
